sentence.Network_en: The composition and all its ingredients are nontoxic.
sentence.Network_cn: 该配方及所有成分是无毒的.

sentence.Network_en: Insects fed on a bland ( nontoxic ) diet would show their real biotic potential.
sentence.Network_cn: 昆虫取食了味纯和的 ( 无毒的 ) 饲料可能表现出它们真正的生物潜能.

sentence.Network_en: Clean production includes clean energy sources, nontoxic production process and health products.
sentence.Network_cn: 清洁生产包括了能源, 生产过程以及产品的清洁化.

auth_sentence.content: Some acid dyes are toxic whereas others are nontoxic.
